: ''Not to be confused with [[Don]].''

'''Dan''' is a male nurse in "[[The One Hundredth]]", portrayed by [[Patrick Fabian]].

With [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] giving birth and all friends at the hospital, [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] meets 2 male nurses and asks [[Monica Geller|Monica]] to go on dates together. As Monica and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] keep their relationship secret, Monica seemingly accepts, which causes an argument with Chandler.

Chandler mocks Dan for having a feminine profession but learns that Dan is in fact a student doctor working to get through medical school and is a Gulf War nurse veteran.

Later Chandler and Monica make up and she tells Dan she wouldn't go.
